description: Semrush's digital marketing blog is an innovative resource for content strategy, content marketing, SEO, SEM, PPC, social media and more.
content: SEO Split Test Result: Power of Caps Lock in the Title TagWe decided to see if changing the word “best“ from lowercase to uppercase in the title tags of category pages on the fishing site would increase organic traffic to this group of pages. Read more to find out the result.Original Research & StudiesFeb 07, 2023Why SEO Testing Is a Must—Practical ExamplesIf you are doing advanced SEO without testing your theories, you are taking unnecessary risks. This article explains why.Original Research & StudiesNov 30, 2022SEO Split Test Result: Removing COVID Advisory Notes (Too Soon?)Most people believe Covid-19 is over, is it time to remove coronavirus information from your pages? Read to find out.Original Research & StudiesNov 25, 2022SEO Split Test: The Effect of Search Intent-Specific Keywords in Your TitleWant to see what happens when you add keywords in a title that are very clearly aligned with the intent of the search? Here is what we found.Original Research & StudiesNov 11, 2022
